Title: Sakhalin LNG’s July exports halve due to planned maintenance
Description: LNG exports in July from the 10.8 mtpa Sakhalin LNG plant at Russia’s Prigorodnoye port in Aniva Bay have fallen against month- and year-earlier levels due to planned maintenance on the plant’s liquefaction trains.
Author: CK

Title: CP2 LNG gets FERC environmental approval, targets construction start later this year
Description: US LNG project developer Venture Global is targeting the start of construction of its proposed CP2 LNG project in Louisiana later this year following the issuance of a positive final environmental impact statement from the US Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.
Author: CK
